languages.text: Речи преподобной Сесилии заворожили экипаж двигательного отсека, сподвигнув людей работать до кровавого пота.
The words of Confessor Cecilia have enraptured the crew of the engines module, spurring them to work through sweat and blood.
languages.original_text: Речи преподобной Сесилии заворожили экипаж двигательного отсека, сподвигнув людей работать до кровавого пота.

traits.locale_text: The words of Reverend Cecilia have enraptured the crew of the engines module, spurring them to work through sweat and blood.

languages.text: Die Worte von Konfessorin Cecilia haben die Crew des Maschinenmoduls entzückt und angespornt, in ihrem Blut und Schweiß zu arbeiten.
languages.original_text: The words of Confessor Cecilia have enraptured the crew of the engines module, spurring them to work through sweat and blood.

traits.locale_text: Die Worte von Reverend Cecilia haben die Crew des Maschinenmoduls entzückt und angespornt, in ihrem Blut und Schweiß zu arbeiten.

languages.text: Les sermons de la confesseure Cécilia ont galvanisé les ouvriers du module des moteurs, qui travaillent désormais à cadence redoublée.
languages.original_text: The words of Confessor Cecilia have enraptured the crew of the engines module, spurring them to work through sweat and blood.

traits.locale_text: Les sermons de la révérende Cécilia ont galvanisé les ouvriers du module des moteurs, qui travaillent désormais à cadence redoublée.

languages.text: Las palabras de la confesora Cecilia han cautivado a la tripulación del módulo de motores, motivándola a trabajar a través de la sangre y el sudor.
languages.original_text: The words of Confessor Cecilia have enraptured the crew of the engines module, spurring them to work through sweat and blood.

traits.locale_text: Las palabras de la reverenda Cecilia han cautivado a la tripulación del módulo de motores, motivándola a trabajar a través de la sangre y el sudor.

languages.text: 聴罪師セシリアの言葉は、エンジンモジュールのクルーたちを熱狂させ、血と汗を流して働くよう駆り立てた。
languages.original_text: The words of Confessor Cecilia have enraptured the crew of the engines module, spurring them to work through sweat and blood.

traits.locale_text: セシリア司祭の言葉は、エンジンモジュールのクルーたちを熱狂させ、血と汗を流して働くよう駆り立てた。

languages.text: 告解神父塞西莉亚的话语让引擎舱室的船员们欣喜若狂，他们毫不吝啬地挥洒着汗水与鲜血。
languages.original_text: The words of Confessor Cecilia have enraptured the crew of the engines module, spurring them to work through sweat and blood.

traits.locale_text: 塞西莉亚牧师的话语让引擎舱室的船员们欣喜若狂，他们毫不吝啬地挥洒着汗水与鲜血。

languages.text: Günah Çıkarıcı Cecilia'nın sözleri; motorlar modülündeki mürettebatı çok etkiledi, onları kan ter içinde çalışmaya teşvik etti.
languages.original_text: The words of Confessor Cecilia have enraptured the crew of the engines module, spurring them to work through sweat and blood.
